qtc.notes: Need to extract from WinISD screenshot

maxPower.description: Power handling vs frequency - excursion and thermal limits

thermalTransition.notes: Where curve transitions from excursion-limited to thermal-limited (flat)

displacement.description: Cone excursion at various power levels
notes: Displacement should decrease with increasing frequency for same power
At thermal limit, displacement should be < Xmax

monotonicity: maxPower must increase monotonically with frequency until thermal limit
maxSPL must increase monotonically with frequency until thermal limit
displacement at constant power must decrease with increasing frequency
limits: maxPower at excursion limit should produce displacement ≈ Xmax (18mm)
maxPower at thermal limit should be ≈ Pe (1200W)
transitions: thermal transition for sealed should be > 35Hz for this driver/volume
Below transition, power increases rapidly with frequency (excursion-limited)

tolerances.reasoning: WinISD uses approximations, we use Small's exact equations - some deviation expected

notes: Values extracted manually from WinISD screenshots
WinISD may use simplified models - perfect match not expected
Goal: Match general behavior and be within tolerance bands
Screenshots stored in same directory for visual reference
